description.p: You are experienced in getting answers. You might have served your hometown as part of the law enforcement, investigating crime scenes and tracking down criminals. Perhaps you offered your skills to the highest bidder as a bounty hunter. Or maybe you are on a personal quest, chasing down answers to a mystery that still haunts you to this day.

ul.li: Tool Proficiencies: Choose either thieves’ tools or disguise kit
Languages:One standard language of your choice
Equipment:Either a set of thieves' tools or a disguise kit, a set of manacles, a set of unassuming clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp.

description.p: Investigators are often inquisitive, curious, thorough, and sometimes a bit paranoid. The secrets they deal in can make them cynical, but also determined.

setters.set: Insight, Investigate, Thieves' Tools or Disguise Kit, Language

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I am incredibly slow to trust. Those who seem the fairest often have the most to hide.
There’s nothing I like more than a good mystery.
I can’t stop asking questions!
I require silence to do my work. I detest noise.
My art is as important as my investigation, and I often paint what I find.
Once I've started an investigation, nothing can stop from getting the answer.
My deductive abilities come naturally to me. I'm not sure why it's so hard for others.
I really can't stand all this subterfuge and dishonesty.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Duty. I make sure that those who run or hide from the law will face it (Lawful)
Greed. I don't care who I'm tracking, as long as I'm getting paid (Evil)
Emancipation. Those in power think they are safe, but they all have secrets that can bring them down (Chaotic)
Charity. I help those who have nowhere else to turn, by getting them the answers they need (Good)
Truth. It is always better to know (Any)
Justice. I track down and punish those who deserve it (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I need to uncover the truth behind a tragedy from my past.
I take contracts in the hope that one day I can repay a large debt.
I learned a terrible secret about a powerful person or group.
A person I care deeply about is still out there, somewhere.
I'd do anything for the few people I trust.
I serve a greater cause, and will protect it from any enemies.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I will never skip an opportunity to prove how clever I am.
I’m too greedy for my own good. I can’t resist a contract no matter the risk.
If you lie to me I will bring you down.
I recognize that face, they must be gaining on me!
I am suspicious of strangers and expect the worst of them.
Once I pick a goal, I become obsessed with it to the detriment of everything else in my life.

description.p: You have a feel for finding people who can help you along with your inquiries. In any community you visit, you can quickly find out who to talk to about the local comings and goings partaining to your current area of interest, and how to get into contact with this person (or group).
